name: Waiting for the Adventure to End
name_original: Waiting for the Adventure to End
description:
A game about waiting for someone to come home.

This game was made for the One Room (Bitsy Jam) - https://itch.io/jam/one-room-bitsy

Never made a game in Bitsy before so was quite fun. Never written a story driven game before either, for what little story there is, but I've given it my best.
